https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mmQZekxr9gJ7c0Grkx6xgKvrpDy.jpg Batman works desperately to find a bomb planted by the Joker while Amanda Waller sends her newly-formed Suicide Squad to break into Arkham Asylum and recover vital information stolen by the Riddler. Batman: Assault on Arkham
